title: New: Laurel – To The Hills
body:
Teenage singer/songwriter **Laurel** gets better with every track she releases.

So the Lana Del Rey comparisons are likely to run hard and fast, yet new track _To The Hills_ has more of a kick to it, whilst retaining the wistful, bubblegum pop elements that made her early demos so attractive. Part of an EP out 7 April on her own imprint Next Time Records, it’s a mightily promising step forward.
